name: Alien Dungeon
description: Purpose: the goal of this game is to kill monsters and arrive at the end of the map and defeat the boss. Controls: PC: WjumpArightSleftspaceto attack Mobile: touch buttonmovimentsATTACKto use Weapon Weapon: press a weapon icon and then the player or space button for attack. press the bow icon and then the player, with the touchpad you can direct the arrow and when you release it the arrow start. weapons harm: sword5pickaxe3ax4arrow5 Credits: Graphics: terraria graphic Sound effects: freesound.org More info: my youtube channel
